column5: Does anyone know if I can hire a guide for a day to take me to some spots on the lake? I have my own gear and sled but have never been to the lake before.   thanks in advance  Ryan
Well Wayne is the best known guide on the lake, he does some winter guiding but summer charters are his specialties .......I think he does a water taxi and canoe towing service too..
Ryan.. the only guy I can think of that "guides" is Rick Lockhart.. x owner of Ketchenany Lodge.  When you thinking of going up? and how many guys?
send me an eamil and i vwill send u ricks nimber a freind of mine , also john harding a swell
Wayne   I'm thinking the 15,16th weekend or the 22,23rd. I must say after seeing your laker, I had to go  do you have a # for him wayne?   thanks  Ryan
I think it closes on the 15th..doesn't it..I might be wrong...
Think you're right Terry... I guess that would mean hiring a guide to guide yer butt right off the lake into some backlakes
I wondered that, I couldnt find my regs this morning to check. Well I guess I might have to try some of the other area lakes insted or wait until next yr.
regs say 3rd sun in march, I might be ok.

Yep... Zone 11 is written for weekend anglers unlike BOQ's. Sunday after the third Saturday... and the problem is it's the entire Zone 11 now not just Lake Temagami. I left my reg print out at the cottage. Guess I'd better go over to CTC today and get a copy, and see what other options there are after the 16th.  Malcom's got you covered for Rick's and John's #'s, Ryan.  I was going to go up this weekend... and why I asked how many guys... but that seems to have gone in the can on me at this point.
